title: 164: Good Moms, Bad Choices
itunes:title: 164: Good Moms, Bad Choices
description:
The Broads are joined by the fantastic and hilarious hosts of podcast “Good Moms, Bad Choices, Erica and Jamilah! They chat about how Erica and Jamilah started their podcast, being sex and cannabis positive single mothers, dating during quarantine, lots of laughs, and much more! 
GOOD MOMS, BAD CHOICES:
Listen, shop, shows, find out everything here: https://www.goodmomsbadchoices.com/
 Follow: @goodmoms_badchoices 
Listen to their podcast here: h (https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/good-moms-bad-choices/id1356670998)  
Join Patreon here: https://www.patreon.com/GoodMomsBadChoices
FOLLOW US AT:
Chatty Broads: @chattybroads
Bekah: @bekah
JESS: @thebaddmom
THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
FIRST LEAF WINE CLUB: Get 6 bottles of wine for ONLY $29.95 at http://tryfirstleaf.com/chatty 
FAB FIT FUN: Use coupon code CHATTY for $10 off your first box at fabfitfun.com (http://fabfitfun.com/) #fabfitfunpartner
HELLO FRESH: Go to HelloFresh.com/80chatty and use code 80chatty to get a total of $80 off, including free shipping on your first box!
PROSE:  Prose.com/chatty (http://prose.com/chatty) for your FREE in-depth hair quiz and 15% off!
THIRD LOVE: Go to THIRDLOVE.COM/CHATTY (http://thirdlove.com/CHATTY) now to find your perfect-fitting bra… and get 15% off your first purchase!
